about.heroSubtitle: With the motto "Timeliness - Dedication - Excellence", we are committed to always providing high-quality, fast, accurate and comprehensive legal services. At Y&P Law Firm, we believe that the true value of a business and legal consulting organization is built on core values. Our services come not only from solid professional knowledge, but also from the heart and vision of our experienced team of lawyers. We understand that customer satisfaction and trust are the most important measures of our success.
about.heroSubtitle2: With many years of experience in providing legal consulting services to large domestic and foreign enterprises, especially experience in cooperating with leading enterprises such as Samsung, Viettel, FPT... and Samsung's suppliers and partners, as well as many Korean and Japanese businesses in Vietnam, Y&P Law Firm is confident in meeting all complex legal requirements of customers, businesses and investors in Vietnam.
about.heroSubtitle3: We are committed to accompanying you on your sustainable development journey, effectively resolving all legal issues, helping you achieve your goals and enhance business value.

about.historyDesc1:
From 2024 to present, Youth & Partners Law Firm has continuously improved its organization, added personnel and expanded the scale of services to meet the increasingly high needs of customers. The company focuses on providing comprehensive solutions and specialized legal consulting services in many fields, including but not limited to:
• Enterprise
• Regular Consulting
• Intellectual Property
• Corporate Governance and Compliance
• Investment Projects
• Business Support Services
• M&A (Mergers and Acquisitions)
• Litigation and Dispute Resolution (Civil, Criminal, Administrative)
• Labor and Employment
• Real Estate Legal Services
about.historyDesc2: During the period from 2021 to 2023, Youth & Partners expanded its network with a new branch in the capital Hanoi. The branch is located at P219 East Tower, National Defense Academy Apartment, Gia Lam District, Hanoi. This is an important step to strengthen presence and expand the market in the northern region, especially in Hanoi - one of Vietnam's most important economic centers.
about.historyDesc3: During the period from 2020 to 2021, Youth & Partners Law Firm implemented a network expansion strategy to improve service quality and better serve customer needs in key areas. Specifically, the company opened a transaction office at 26 Doan Tran Nghiep, Que Vo Industrial Park, Bac Ninh, expanding its business scope and enhancing its presence in the local market.
about.historyDesc4: To meet development needs, in January 2020, after 6 months of operation, the company moved its headquarters to 170 Nguyen Van Linh, Lien Bao Ward, Vinh Yen City, Vinh Phuc Province, which is also the company's current headquarters. Along with this important transition, the company's scale has also increased significantly, with the number of personnel tripling compared to the beginning, marking a solid step in the development of Y&P Law Firm.
about.historyDesc5: On October 09, 2019, Youth & Partners Law Firm was officially established at 67 Pham Hong Thai Street, Lien Bao Ward, Vinh Yen City, Vinh Phuc Province.
about.historyOrgDevDesc: From 2024 to present, Youth & Partners Law Firm has continuously improved its organization, added personnel and expanded the scale of services to meet the increasingly high needs of customers.
about.historyExpandHanoiDesc: During the period from 2021 to 2023, Youth & Partners expanded its network with a new branch in the capital Hanoi.
about.historyExpandBacNinhDesc: During the period from 2020 to 2021, Youth & Partners Law Firm implemented a network expansion strategy to improve service quality.
about.historyAddressChangeDesc: To meet development needs, in January 2020, the company moved its headquarters to a new address.
about.historyEstablishDesc: On October 09, 2019, Youth & Partners Law Firm was officially established.
about.visionSubtitle:
Vision Youth & Partners aims to become one of the leading law firms in Vietnam, a trusted partner that customers always think of when they need to find legal solutions. We are committed to constantly innovating, improving service quality and developing a team of experienced and dedicated lawyers to meet the increasingly high needs of customers. With passion, professionalism and outstanding adaptability, we aspire to become a symbol of excellence in the legal industry, bringing sustainable value to customers and society.

Mission Youth & Partners Law Firm is committed to accompanying customers on their journey to protect their rights and achieve their legal goals effectively and timely. With the motto "Timeliness, Dedication, Excellence", we always put the interests of customers first and resolve diverse and complex legal issues with the highest sense of responsibility. Our mission is not only to provide legal services, but also to become a trusted partner, helping customers and partners overcome all legal challenges, contributing to the sustainable development of businesses and the community.
about.ourServicesSubtitle: At Youth & Partners Law Firm, we are proud to provide professional legal services and consulting, designed to meet the diverse needs of customers. With a team of experienced lawyers and extensive professional knowledge, we are committed to providing optimal solutions for all legal issues, including but not limited to:
about.legalServiceDesc: Our experienced team of lawyers is ready to handle all complex legal issues. From commercial disputes, intellectual property to civil and criminal cases, we provide comprehensive legal services.
about.regularConsultServiceDesc: We provide regular consulting services for enterprises, helping you manage legal risks, comply with legal regulations and optimize business processes.
about.laborConsultServiceDesc: We provide consulting on labor issues to ensure the rights of both employers and employees. Services include labor contract consulting, employee benefits, dispute resolution and labor process optimization.
about.investmentServiceDesc: We provide legal solutions for investors and foreigners who want to do business or live in Vietnam. From company establishment, labor permit application to resolving other related legal issues, we provide comprehensive support.
about.evaluationServiceDesc: We provide comprehensive enterprise evaluation solutions, helping you better understand business performance, financial situation and risk factors. We are committed to providing the most accurate and comprehensive evaluation.

about.ourCustomersSubtitle: We are proud of our extensive partner and customer network, including reputable businesses, organizations and individuals in many different fields. Our collaborative partners include leading law firms, strategic consulting organizations and international financial companies. We work closely with them to provide the most optimal and professional legal solutions.

team.heroSubtitle: The lawyers and associates at Youth & Partners are leading legal experts with years of practical experience in key areas. We are proud to provide multilingual legal consulting services to meet all needs of domestic and international clients.
team.statsSubtitle: Impressive numbers about the legal expert team at Youth & Partners
team.lawyersIntro: Youth & Partners Law Company Limited is one of the leading law firms in Vietnam, with a team of experienced lawyers and associates with deep expertise. The company provides high-quality, fast, accurate and comprehensive legal services.
team.lawyersIntro2: Youth & Partners' team of lawyers includes experts with many years of experience in various fields such as regular legal consulting for businesses, labor dispute resolution, private lawyers in Japanese, English, Chinese, Korean, and audit, evaluation and legal due diligence services for businesses. The company is always committed to bringing fairness and success to clients, helping them move steadily on the path of development.
team.expertiseSubtitle: Our team is professionally trained and has practical experience in many legal fields

testimonials.title: Client Testimonials
testimonials.subtitle: Clients are satisfied with legal services at Youth & Partners, highly appreciating the dedication and professionalism of our legal team in resolving complex legal issues. They trust and are willing to continue using our services in the future.

homepage.servicesSubtitle: Our law firm always strives to provide quality, fast, accurate and complete services to our clients.
homepage.regularConsultationDesc: With diverse experience in many business sectors, especially foreign-invested manufacturing enterprises, over the years we have proudly been the provider of high-quality regular legal consulting services to many large domestic and foreign enterprises in Vietnam such as Samsung, Intel Vietnam, Viettel, FPT, TopCV, Cosmos, Rikkeisoft... as well as many Korean, Japanese, and Australian enterprises.
homepage.regularConsultationDesc2: In particular, to date, Y&P is one of the very few law firms that can provide in-depth consulting on Corporate Social Responsibility (CSR) issues or specifically the RBA Code of Conduct (Responsible Business Alliance) currently applied to many businesses, especially electronics enterprises. This makes us a trusted and suitable partner for manufacturing enterprises that must comply with this Code.
homepage.laborLawDesc: As a law firm currently providing regular legal consulting for over 20 enterprises and continuously participating in consulting and resolving many labor cases/lawsuits, Y&P Law Firm can confidently claim to be a leading expert in Vietnam in this field. Our website has a dedicated labor law section, with in-depth analysis of regulations, collective agreements, labor/training contracts, wages & benefits, working hours, contract termination, disciplinary actions, sexual harassment, NDA/NCA...
homepage.laborLawDesc2: In addition, we regularly organize/co-organize training courses and workshops with thousands of attendees as speakers to disseminate labor knowledge to the community. Additionally, we annually organize our own training courses on clean organization, anti-sexual harassment, RBA code of conduct, emphasizing areas with high dispute risks in enterprises such as resignation handling, complaints, denunciations, and disciplinary actions. Especially for regular consulting clients of Y&P Law Firm, the training program is free.
homepage.foreignInvestmentDesc: Y&P Law Firm's investment project consulting experience includes advising domestic and foreign enterprises throughout the consulting process to help clients navigate the complex intersection of Vietnamese and foreign laws. We are committed to supporting clients in all forms of investment from the beginning of the investment plan until the project is operational.
homepage.foreignInvestmentDesc2: M&A is one of the main foundations of Y&P Law Firm's investment consulting field, focusing on mergers and acquisitions. With our strong grasp of investment incentive policies, taxation and finance in FDI investment activities, we have helped clients execute thousands of complex structured transactions and overcome many challenges from current legal regulations to constantly changing geopolitical situations.
homepage.evaluationServiceDesc: Today, compliance with local legal regulations and meeting social responsibility standards is a matter of survival for businesses. Many businesses have paid the price of their legal entity's existence for neglecting compliance with laws and social responsibility standards.
homepage.evaluationServiceDesc2: The Managing Lawyer of Y&P Law Firm is a Lead Auditor of Samsung Corporation in Vendor Audit campaigns/programs. Accordingly, we have enough experience and confidence to provide comprehensive business evaluation services, helping clients gain deep insights into their entire business operations and identify potential risk factors.
homepage.trackResponseDesc: Monitor your email or phone for responses from our customer support team. If you don't receive a response within the expected time, please contact us again to ensure your issue is not overlooked.
homepage.latestNewsDesc: Our news page provides the latest updates on legal issues, with articles from leading legal experts, ensuring you always stay informed about important changes in your areas of interest.
homepage.testimonialsSubtitle: Clients are satisfied with legal services at Youth & Partners, highly appreciating the dedication and professionalism of our legal team in resolving complex legal issues. They trust and are willing to continue using our services in the future.
homepage.ourPartnersDesc: We are proud of our extensive network of partners and clients, including reputable businesses, organizations, and individuals in various fields. Our cooperation partners include leading law firms, strategic consulting organizations, and international financial companies. We work closely with them to deliver optimal and professional legal solutions.
homepage.contactForConsultDesc: We are always ready to listen and support you with dedication and professionalism. Let us help you solve all legal issues quickly and efficiently!

principles.title: Our Operating Principles
principles.timeDesc: We understand that every legal matter has specific time requirements and strict factors. Therefore, our legal team always strives to ensure that work progresses quickly and efficiently, helping clients achieve desired results in the shortest time possible.
principles.dedicationDesc: Every lawyer at Youth & Partners is committed to putting their heart into each case, always listening and understanding client needs to provide optimal and most suitable solutions. We believe that dedication is the key factor in building trust and long-term relationships with clients.
principles.excellenceDesc: We don't just provide legal services, but always strive to overcome all challenges to protect the legitimate rights of our clients. With our team of experienced lawyers who are always ready to face any situation, Youth & Partners Law Firm is committed to bringing justice and success to our clients, helping them move forward on the path of development.

steps.contactDesc: Describe your issue and gather relevant documents. Contact us via Hotline, Zalo, WhatsApp, Facebook or Email
steps.sendRequestDesc: Describe your issue in detail via email or phone and attach relevant documents
steps.trackResponseDesc: Monitor your email or phone for responses from our customer support team. If you don't receive a response within the expected time, please contact us again to ensure your issue is not overlooked.

servicesExtra.featuredProjectsSubtitle: We are proud to have successfully completed numerous consulting projects for businesses and organizations of all sizes, delivering real value and effective legal solutions.
servicesExtra.workWithUs: Work with Youth & Partners for Success
servicesExtra.projectSwiss: SWISS – BELRESIDENCES UPPER EAST SAIGON Project
servicesExtra.avenueDesc: The project covers over 2 hectares in the Tay Tuu urban functional zone, Hanoi. This is a pioneering project that brings a new living standard to the area.
servicesExtra.avenueRole: Y&P Lawfirm serves as a comprehensive consultant for the Investor from the project preparation phase to the operation phase, project implementation, and all legal issues arising in the Project.
servicesExtra.embassyDesc: The project covers 3.5 hectares in the Tay Ho Tay Urban Area with a total investment of over VND 2,000 billion. The Embassy Garden villa system offers modern design, comfortable spaces, and beautiful natural landscapes, promising to be an ideal residence for customers seeking excellent living spaces in the inner city.
servicesExtra.embassyRole: Y&P Lawfirm is a consultant for Vietnam Asset Development JSC (VAD) in project operations and management, transfers between the investor and villa owners in the Project.
servicesExtra.swissDesc: Swiss Belresidences Upper East Saigon is the first branded apartment project in Thu Duc City, developed by Hasco Group. The project is located at 800 Dong Van Cong, Thanh My Loi Ward, Thu Duc City.
servicesExtra.swissRole: Y&P Lawfirm serves as a comprehensive consultant for the Investor from the project preparation phase to the operation phase, project implementation, and all legal issues arising in the Project.

lawyers.caoThiPhuongAnhBio:
Areas of Responsibility:

• Corporate Law: Provide regular legal advice and legal support to enterprises on daily legal issues, compliance, and internal operations.

• Internal Regulations: Review and analyze legal documents, contracts, and legal documents related to enterprise operations.

• Corporate Procedures: Support drafting and reviewing commercial contracts, internal documents, and legal papers according to company and client requirements.

• Regular Consultation: Participate in researching and updating new laws, providing practical legal solutions for enterprises.
lawyers.caoThiPhuongAnhExp:
• 12/2024 – 6/2025: Legal Intern at AIC Law Firm - Engaged with cases related to corporate and labor law, assisted in drafting contracts and legal documents.
• 7/2025 – 10/2025: Legal Intern at Chan Tin Nghia Law Company - Participated in legal consulting for small and medium enterprises, researched new legal regulations, and supported resolution of legal issues.
• 11/2025 - 12/2025: Legal Intern at Xuan Hoa Ward People's Committee, Phu Tho Province - Worked with administrative documents, assisted in resolving administrative procedures for citizens and businesses.
• 12/2025 to present: Legal Specialist – Youth & Partners Law Firm (YPLaw Firm)
Specializes in providing regular legal consultation to corporate clients, drafting and reviewing contracts, researching and updating legal regulations, supporting lawyers in complex projects related to investment and corporate law.
